com.microsoft.azure

Class AzureServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.AzureServiceClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AzureClient, BatchServiceClientImpl, ComputeManagementClientImpl, DataLakeAnalyticsAccountManagementClientImpl, DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClientImpl, DataLakeAnalyticsJobManagementClientImpl, DataLakeStoreAccountManagementClientImpl, DataLakeStoreFileSystemManagementClientImpl, FeatureClientImpl, NetworkManagementClientImpl, ResourceManagementClientImpl, StorageManagementClientImpl, SubscriptionClientImpl, WebSiteManagementClientImpl

    public abstract class AzureServiceClient
extends Object
    ServiceClient is the abstraction for accessing REST operations and their payload data types.
